### evaluateFixup() {#a34670d9dbd338658ac3fb3b313ba9e31}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool MCAssembler::evaluateFixup (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup">MCFixup</a> &amp; Fixup, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfragment">MCFragment</a> &#42; DF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcvalue">MCValue</a> &amp; Target, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &#42; STI, uint64&#95;t &amp; Value, bool &amp; WasForced) const</>}>
Evaluate a fixup to a relocatable expression and the value which should be placed into the fixup.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Fixup">The fixup to evaluate.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="DF">The fragment the fixup is inside.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="<a href=&quot;/docs/api/classes/llvm/target&quot;>Target</a>">&#91;out&#93; On return, the relocatable expression the fixup evaluates to.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="<a href=&quot;/docs/api/classes/llvm/value&quot;>Value</a>">&#91;out&#93; On return, the value of the fixup as currently laid out.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="WasForced">&#91;out&#93; On return, the value in the fixup is set to the correct value if WasForced is true, even if evaluateFixup returns false.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
Whether the fixup value was fully resolved. This is true if the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a></code> result is fixed, otherwise the value may change due to relocation.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcassembler-h/#l00103">103</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcassembler-h">MCAssembler.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcassembler-cpp/#l00143">143</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcassembler-cpp">MCAssembler.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
